scripts.globalDeps: npm install -g bower@1.8.4 pulp@12.0.1 purescript@0.11.7 typescript@2.7.2 webpack@3.11.0
scripts.heroku-prebuild: export NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false && export NODE_ENV= && npm run-script globalDeps && npm run-script setup --prefix purs && npm run-script setup --prefix client
scripts.heroku-postbuild: export NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=true && export NODE_ENV=production && npm run-script build --prefix purs && npm run-script deploy --prefix client
